text: Targets Fluid management * Warm and well * Important factor in post- perfused transplant renal function * Adequate MAP (ideally + Typically require ~40 mikg within 20% of baseline) crystalloid (0.9% NaCl) « Euvolaemia * (olloid and blood rarely *« CVP 1015 mmHg required « (aution re overzealous filling which can strain the myocardium
